subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=130|rad=肉|as=08|sn=12|four=|canj=BJBM|ids=⿰月直}}

# a [[piece]] of [[dried]] [[seasoning|season]]ed [[meat]] that is one [[foot]], two [[inch]]es (about 35.56 [[centimetre|cm]]) long
# to [[paste]] [[up]]
# to [[attach]] to; to [[stick]] up; to [[glue]]
# (same as [[殖]]) [[rotten]] [[fat]]; [[grease]], [[lard]], etc.
# [[bowels]]
# [[fat]]
